author: Ratke, Wolfgang, 1571-1635
title: Desiderata methodus nova Ratichiana lingvas compendiose artificiose discendi ab autore ipso amicis communicata, nunc vero ingratiam studiosa juventutis juris publici facta [Wolfgang Ratich]
imprint: "Halæ Saxonum: Petrus Faber typis exscribebat, impensis Joachimi Krusicken, 1615"
